bill_title: Commending and honoring Renee Ullom, a member of the Brandon Valley School District Board of Education, on her selection as the Associated School Boards of South Dakota Outstanding School Board Member of South Dakota for 2019.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring Renee Ullom, a member of the Brandon Valley School District Board of Education, on her selection as the Associated School Boards of South Dakota Outstanding School Board Member of South Dakota for 2019. WHEREAS, through her various leadership roles and involvement in advocacy, Renee Ullom has created a learning environment resulting in student success and provided excellent educational opportunities for all children in the Brandon Valley School District; and WHEREAS, Renee Ullom has played a key role in directing the development of the Brandon Valley Strategic Plan that includes the "VISION of a Graduate," which outlines the vision the district's system has for its students; she continually works to drive student achievement forward through the support of the administration's utilization of research-based best practices; and WHEREAS, Renee Ullom's direction and support for collaborative processes has enhanced community and parent involvement and has worked to strengthen school, family, and community engagement: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that during 2020, Renee Ullom, Brandon, South Dakota, is hereby an official representative of the state and shall continue in her efforts to seek improvement of the educational opportunities for the K-12 students of the state.

ENTITLED A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring Renee Ullom, a member of the Brandon Valley School District Board of Education, on her selection as the Associated School Boards of South Dakota Outstanding School Board Member of South Dakota for 2019. WHEREAS, through her various leadership roles and involvement in advocacy, Renee Ullom has created a learning environment resulting in student success and provided excellent educational opportunities for all children in the Brandon Valley School District; and WHEREAS, Renee Ullom has played a key role in directing the development of the Brandon Valley Strategic Plan that includes the "VISION of a Graduate," which outlines the vision the district's system has for its students; she continually works to drive student achievement forward through the support of the administration's utilization of research-based best practices; and WHEREAS, Renee Ullom's direction and support for collaborative processes have enhanced community and parent involvement and have worked to strengthen school, family, and community engagement: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that during 2020, Renee Ullom, Brandon, South Dakota, is hereby an official representative of the state and shall continue in her efforts to seek improvement of the educational opportunities for the K-12 students of the state.
